name: Car
description: A reliable, fuel-efficient sedan perfect for daily commuting and long road trips. Featuring advanced safety features, a spacious interior, and excellent fuel economy.

name: Electric Bike
description: A high-performance electric bike designed for urban commuting. It features a long-lasting battery, adjustable speed modes, and a lightweight frame for a smooth ride.

name: Smartphone
description: A cutting-edge smartphone with a stunning display, high-speed performance, and an advanced camera system. Comes with 128GB of storage and 5G connectivity.

name: Laptop
description: A sleek, lightweight laptop with powerful specs for productivity and entertainment. Equipped with a high-resolution screen, long battery life, and fast processing power.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality noise-canceling wireless headphones with deep bass and crystal-clear sound. Perfect for music lovers, commuters, and gamers.

name: Coffee Machine
description: A premium coffee machine with a built-in grinder, multiple brewing options, and a sleek modern design. Ideal for home or office use.

name: Smartwatch
description: A stylish smartwatch that tracks your fitness, health metrics, and notifications. Features a heart rate monitor, GPS, and customizable watch faces.

name: Gaming Console
description: A next-generation gaming console with stunning graphics, fast loading times, and access to a wide range of games. Compatible with VR and streaming services.

name: Office Chair
description: Ergonomically designed office chair for long hours of comfortable sitting. Adjustable height, lumbar support, and breathable fabric make it perfect for the workplace.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with rich sound quality and a waterproof design. Perfect for outdoor adventures, beach trips, and casual listening.

name: Electric Scooter
description: An electric scooter designed for fast and efficient urban transportation. With a range of up to 25 miles on a single charge, it's ideal for short commutes and city cruising.

name: Digital Camera
description: A professional digital camera with high resolution and advanced features for photographers. Includes a 24MP sensor, 4K video recording, and built-in WiFi.
